lines.p: Look! How good and how pleasant it isFor brothers to dwell together in unity!
It is like fine oil poured on the headThat runs down the beard,Aaron’s beard,And runs down onto the collar of his garments.

It is like the dew of HerʹmonThat descends on the mountains of Zion.
That is where Jehovah decreed his blessing—Life everlasting.
